item.title: Korea Box Office: ‘My Daughter Is a Zombie’ Dominates, ‘F1’ Holds Second
item.description: South Korean fantasy comedy “My Daughter Is a Zombie” dominated the Korean box office over the Aug. 1–3 weekend, earning $8.3 million from 1.17 million admissions. According to KOBIS, the
